"Read to Succeed" - A nonprofit organization that provides free books and literacy resources to underprivileged children.
"Lit Up" - A nonprofit that uses art and storytelling to promote literacy and creativity in children.
"Books for Brighter Futures" - A nonprofit that provides books and educational resources to children in foster care.
"Reading Rocks" - A nonprofit that uses music and movement to teach literacy skills to young children.
"Empowering Readers" - A nonprofit that provides literacy training and resources to women in developing countries.
